titles.title: To prohibit any foreign person from acquiring, directly or indirectly, Allison Transmission, a division of General Motors Corporation.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Prohibits any foreign person from acquiring ownership or control of Allison Transmission, a division of General Motors Corporation (and the sole provider of high technology transmissions equipment for the M1 tank program). Directs the Attorney General to seek appropriate relief to carry out this Act.
